document_data.name: Staerngates
document_data.mainbody: '''Staerngates''' was the estate of the wealthy [[Thonok]] family of [[Purskul]] in [[Amn]].
document_data.History: Staerngates was a fine manse built by [[Staernel Thonok]], the family's founder, who was renowned for his financial acumen yet infamous for dabbling in [[necromancy]]. Staerngates was still the Thonok seat of power, long after Staernel's "death," in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
